name: minorjs
description: Clustered web framework that favors convention over configuration.

scripts.unit: BABEL_ENV=test mocha --reporter dot --timeout 5000 --require babel-register --require babel-polyfill --require should --recursive
scripts.test: npm run compile && npm run lint && npm run unit:all && npm run functional && npm run cuke
